title: UPDATED 1BR APT AVAILABLE NOW- NO FEE- HOT WATER INCL'D- 1ST FLOOR!
map_address: 197 N Main St near Rosseter St
posting_body: Call 857-763-2899 to schedule a viewing or click <URL> to schedule an appointment
Address is 193 N Main St, Unit #2, Brockton, MA
We proudly own and manage this property so there is NO FEE.
Hot water is INCLUDED in monthly rent of $1195!
We currently have for rent a clean 1 bedroom apartment on the 1st floor- AVAILABLE NOW!
Updates for the new tenants include: new windows, new appliances, and it has just been freshly painted throughout.
It is located on North Main Street just north of the center of Brockton with access to lots of bus lines.
It resides in a 3 story brick property (all 1BRs and studios) with plenty of street parking available right out front or in our driveway out back.
Credit, criminal history, eviction history, and references are checked and 1st and last month's rent ($2390) are REQUIRED to move in, absolutely no exceptions.
We have great, friendly tenants, so if this sounds like a place you'd like to live, we look forward to meeting you.
Sorry, NO DOGS (insurance won't allow it).
To schedule a viewing of this unit please call 857-763-2899 or if you have general questions please call us at 888 383 5833.
